text:
Grand Concourse, at the N. W. corner of E. 150th Street, showing the Mott Avenue Methodist Episcopal Church. This part of the Concourse was formerly Mott Avenue.

May 16, 1928

P. L. Sperr

(2)

The same site, after the church was torn down.

June, 1940

P. L. Sperr
title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 150th Street (East)

title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 150th Street (East)

text:
Grand Concourse, south from E. 151st Street. Note, at E. 150th Street, the skeleton of a new United States Post Office.
View 2 is south from E. 150th Street and shows the post office site extending to E. 149th Street.

July 7, 1936
Views 1,2

P. L. Sperr
